storyInfo: The spirits, dubbed Waregeists by Zuo Le, begin besieging the masses. Liang Xun has sought out Miss Ning due to the goblet affair, and is deeply concerned. Mr. Nothing suffers an attack from the rear, and who should come to his rescue but Zuo Le?

attributes.content: One noon tea.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Alright! Take a seat, Master Shang!
attributes.name: Teahouse Assistant

attributes.content: Why so late to work today?
attributes.name: Teahouse Assistant

attributes.content: Met an old acquaintance in the morning.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Which acquaintance?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Lungmenite.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Fine day. Fancy meeting you again, Master.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What, still looking for that pavilion?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: You helped me considerably by narrowing things down, but I'm still meant to find a person and not just a pavilion, so there's yet more to do.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Is that your sweetheart, sitting over there?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: What...?!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Ahem. No, I'm not that brave...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Oh, your daughter, then?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I hardly seem the fathering kind, don't I?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That's true.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Hey, what did you just say?! Me and that Lungmenite conman are what?!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: A man and woman going up the mountains at this hour, in early spring. Nothing else to do, probably.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Master Shang, your noon tea.
attributes.name: Teahouse Assistant

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Noon tea? Not sure if it's noon yet.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Every Shangshu pole-carrier gets two free servings of tea in the mountain teahouses. A noon tea in the morning, a sunset tea in the afternoon, each with some small sides.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: The taste of a free tea is always fine.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's tea, nothing more.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: But it's in the mountains, see. Mountain tea's always a bit more expensive. And if it's complimentary, you've made out like a bandit.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You manage your books well.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Are the shopkeepers really that kind, though? Is it all out of benevolence?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The authorities subsidize it, duh.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: ...And you'd know?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: My home happens to be a food service establishment too. Of course I've got some idea.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: ...I see.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Are you close with the Shangshu authorities?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Have been since Mr. Liang took up office.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: The last few Shangshu governors were about construction, civil projects, developing the mountains and forests—not just recovering the city from all its troubles, but breathing even more life into it.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Maybe Governor Liang Xun thought the city was renewed enough when he came in, because his agenda was peace and love for the citizens instead... Whatever you think of this, you've seen nothing yet.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: You're wise, for your young age.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: My dad does business. It's all just osmosis.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: You have a fine father.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I've finished my tea. I should be on my way now.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: See you again, Master Shang.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: See you again.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: —Hey! Lee, what's he doing with the goblet?!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Not sure. But he's got no motive to hide, hanging it off his belt for anyone to see. It's like...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: He's asking for someone to come at him?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Ignore it. Let's have some tea ourselves, and see how this plays out.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Waiter! Two pots of tea, and two of the shredded meat noodles.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'm not having anything.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I'll be eating them both.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Your two pots of tea, sir. The noodles will be a bit longer; we're busy today.
attributes.name: Teahouse Assistant

attributes.content: Thank you...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Ao?
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: Why follow us all the way here?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Phhh... ao!
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: Hey. Lee. I'm going to ask you something, and you can't laugh.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Did that teapot—just move by itself...?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Shredded meat noodles—
attributes.name: Teahouse Assistant

attributes.content: Whoa! Mind it, sir, I'm carrying your noodles here!
attributes.name: Teahouse Assistant

attributes.content: Aoww?
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: What the hell is this?!
attributes.name: Teahouse Assistant

attributes.content: Careful!
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Urgh!
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: —Hey, are you okay there?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: The stuff in the kitchen, the cloth and the brushwork... they're all... jumping out!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Yaaagh! What is that?!
attributes.name: Startled Customer

attributes.content: Fire! Fire, this monster's on fire!
attributes.name: Teahouse Assistant

attributes.content: They're charging at us.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hey, Lee! Tell me what the hell's going on?!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: So the rumors about that goblet were true... There's too many people in here, let's move!
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: How do we reach young Lee?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: He told us in the letter he left. After we meet up, we find him at the summit of Qujiang Peak. If he's not there yet, we wait until sundown.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Good. We'll stick to it. We can't let the goblet fall into anyone else's hands.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Benefactor, how should we respond to those Ink Spirit-esque manifestations from earlier?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Chances are it's linked to the cup... We'll rendezvous with Mr. Lee first.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Oh!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Aoww—
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: Benefactor, would you say they've—er—proliferated?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Hm? What breed of beast is this? Why have they been everywhere for the last two days?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: We've been surrounded, haven't we...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Ao!
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: Oh, you're feisty ones.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: —There's no other way! Benefactor, you and Master Shen take your leave for now, and I'll handle these miscreants!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: —You alright with that?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: They act more or less as the Ink Spirits do. Reason says I should cope.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Master Shen! This way!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: What troubles you? You seem so ill at ease.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Nothing.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Your brows always wrinkle when you worry for people.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Do they?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: They do. Who garners such concern from you, my Lord?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I'm worried for that friend of mine.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: What has become of him?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: He's gotten into a gamble.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: One you asked him to take.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: ...True.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Are you now remorseful?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I still believe this was the best option.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I'm simply not sure...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You are very clever, my Lord.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I wouldn't claim to be.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I just chose a stupid method.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Is every beast in Yan like this?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Ao?
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: Hm? Light? Oh, don't worry... mm, I'm happy as long as I have you all with me.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Still, though...
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Drill! Keep a hold on it, now!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Completely new Yanese beasts... you might just make for some unexpected traps!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Dear me! What's going on? Did I offend some horror in recent times? Why are my days filled with contesting these menageries of creatures?!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: —Oho?!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Wrrao!
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: ...On closer inspection, these things are...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Wrr—
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: (Damned—)
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Close call.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Are you hurt, sir?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You must be... from the other day—
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Don't ask.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: No need to be so cold, Uncle Taihe...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Would you know where these things arose from?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Wherever the goblet goes, Waregeists spring up. Ironically, it's proving the Sui Regulator's conjectures.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Does this mean...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Mind your words, young man.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: As you instruct, Uncle Taihe.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Wrrao—wrr!
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: (These sprites—er, Waregeists... are they scared of these two? No, is it specifically the boy that cowers them...?)
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Take a look at these Waregeists. How many incidents like this have we had?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Ten, twenty-five, and a full sixty years ago, with several more still.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: While we have wrongdoers wreaking havoc with Originium Arts on occasion, things really don't come any better than this.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But Sui in the end is Sui, and a beast in the end is a beast. If your people carry intent to harm the realm, then Heaven knows how great the disaster will be.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Ao—
attributes.name: Waregeist

attributes.content: The Sui Regulator has no desire to see such things come to pass.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Which is why we need to settle this millennium-long mess swiftly and cleanly.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: ...No more than detritus.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Those things... reverted back into common wares...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Mr. Nothing.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: ...Hmm.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Please, convey this to Ms. Kroos for me. I want her to reconsider what I've said.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: We can be on good terms regardless. Even if she should ultimately have her own considerations, my side still has a matter it wishes to entrust to Rhodes Island irrespective of position.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I can assent to passing it on, but why didn't you convey this to her yourself when the moment was ripe?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Haha... well, at that moment...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I was a little tensed up. I didn't get everything out.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Lord Zuo.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Well, then... It seems we can't delay any longer. Mr. Nothing, we bid you farewell.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Seems tense?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: So a young nobleman who scampers about with the Deputy Imperial Censor in tow has a case of the nerves?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing
